Items.text: Sirs, I'm going in to investigate.
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: If I yell, then run outside for help!
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: And all of the money is still in there as well.
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: That's not a hole in the wall! It's...
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: Not A Hole, I'm THE Hole!
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: Supervillian of getting in even the most restricted spaces.
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: I can make myself the hole in any wall!
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: ... as long as it's not thicker than me, which this Vault is.
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: But, hehe, you have solved that for me by opening it just now!
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: Thank you kids, I couldn't have done it without you.
Items.name: Banker

Items.text: Now, I'll let my grunts take care of you, and I'll be in the vault!
Items.name: Banker
